snippet.title: HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED 2 Simulator 3D -  Monster Trucks and Sports Cars Racing - PC GamePlay #2
snippet.description:
❤ Subscribe to Channel : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGu9-9FqQtXAitxkOnHzz6Q?sub_confirmation=1
   ↓ More Information & App Download ↓
➔ Download Games : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2051120/HOT_WHEELS_UNLEASHED_2__Turbocharged
➔ Game Developer : Milestone S.r.l.
➔ The coolest cars are back! The fun reaches a new level! Over 130 cars with updated control mechanics, new types of vehicles are waiting for you.
MORE CARS - MORE FUN
Over 130 different cars are waiting for you! Not only Hot Wheels™ Originals, but also Hot Wheels™ Monster Trucks, and cars from the world of entertainment. Race motorcycles and ATVs with your own unique control style!
The new system divides the vehicles into categories, each category can be improved with the help of the skill tree. Make your car unstoppable!

HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED 2 Simulator 3D
Whether it's a house in the suburbs or a miniature golf course in the Wild West, your tracks will always pass through amazingly beautiful places.
Discover 5 new locations full of secrets.
What could make racing even more interesting? New types of terrain! Grass, sand and other obstacles affect the handling - keep this in mind when choosing a car.

SHOW OFF YOUR CLASS
Before you impress your opponents with victory, amaze them with skill! In addition to drifting and boost, you can use lateral acceleration and jumps - single and double. This way, you can push your opponents off the track or dodge a barrier.
Jumps also help you avoid cars and find secret paths!

RACE AS YOU LIKE
Are you a daredevil who turns every race into pure adrenaline? A fan of endurance tests? A fan of spectacular crashes? You're in luck! HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED™ 2 - Turbocharged has all this and much more. Play both online and offline.

LET YOUR CREATIVITY GO!
Create your dream track in the track editor or try out the best creations from the community.
Beautiful tracks need spectacular cars. For this, there is a new paint editor with new features like a sticker editor. Create and save your creations to decorate your car with them.

Monster Trucks and Sports Cars Racing
A new adventure awaits you in the new campaign mode. The city is under attack, and only you can save it. How? Very simple - you need to win races and pass challenges! Okay, maybe it's not that easy, but it's definitely interesting! Get ready to become not just a winner, but a real hero!
